page.title: 13HOME LIFE
page.content: My dad Terry Garvey works for Bowater Containers as a Despatch supervisor.He makes sure that the finished products that come off the machines are loaded onto the right vehicles which are to be delivered to the factories which await the goods.Also during his work he may want to check up on the Despatch computer for stocks avalable.The shifts my dad works are two till ten one week and six till two the next.He might be called out to work if someone is taken ill or if they've got alot of work on he sometimes works during the weekend of which he gets overtime money. Jonathan Garvey
